about_the_game:
What would it look like if Seoul turned into black and white?

The original work of [/b] by author Choi Young-A is a wordless picture book that tells the adventure of a rabbit who brings back a piece of the moon that fell due to a meteor strike. The background of the story, set in ancient Korea, is transformed into modern-day Seoul, adding a touch of fairy-tale imagination to convey a completely new narrative.[/p]

is a 3D adventure game that starts from a small rooftop room. The journey leads the player through a mission to find scattered moon fragments and restore the lost colors of the city. Embark on a cozy and healing adventure, playing as the rabbit in a realistic version of Seoul. As you restore colors and beautify the city, you will find new challenges and courage within yourself.

Key Features

  • Coloring Healing Play: Explore the black-and-white world, find moon fragments, and restore colors to heal your mind.

  • Diverse Adventures: Travel through peaceful villages, cross stone bridges and dangerous roads, ride on an eagle’s back, and soar through the skies as you head towards the moon.

  • Emotional Storytelling: Experience hope and comfort through the journey of the rabbit from a small rooftop room to the world beyond.

Healing and Challenging Adventure

 is more than just a game. Combining realistic urban landscapes with a fairy-tale narrative, this game offers warmth and inspiration to players of all ages. Through the journey of restoring colors, players will encounter new challenges and reconnect with the deep stories within their hearts.

Start your journey now, reclaim the city’s colors, and reach the moon!

name: Luna Hop

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel CORE i5-12400F / AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 or AMD R7 260x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtak
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel CORE i5-12400F / AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel CORE i5-12400F / AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 32 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtak

short_description: Luna Hop is a 3D adventure game set in a black-and-white Seoul, inspired by The Moon Rabbit. Play as a rabbit, restore colors by solving puzzles, and follow a heartwarming journey from a rooftop room to the world, filled with comfort and courage.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support
